title: mc_observers::BodySensor
description: BodySensor: update floating base state from a body sensor. This is typically used to set the floating base state from a simulator groundtruth

robot.description: Name of the robot to observe

method.description: Update from sensor or control values

bodySensor.description: Body sensor used to set the floating base state (only used if method=sensor). When empty, the main body sensor will be used.
